title: AdventureLog LXC
textContent:
AdventureLog LXC 
                AdventureLog
                    Discover
                    and plan your next adventure with AdventureLog. Explore breathtaking destinations, create custom
                    itineraries, and stay connected on the go.
                To create a new Proxmox VE AdventureLog LXC, run the following in the Proxmox VE Shell.
                    To Update AdventureLog, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/adventurelog.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 7GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡
                AdventureLog Interface - IP:3000
outerHTML:
AdventureLog LXC

AdventureLog Discover and plan your next adventure with AdventureLog. Explore breathtaking destinations, create custom itineraries, and stay connected on the go.

To create a new Proxmox VE AdventureLog LXC, run the following in the Proxmox VE Shell.
To Update AdventureLog, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/adventurelog.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 7GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡

AdventureLog Interface - IP:3000
